channel.title: Indie Groundbreaker Nominees
channel.description:
The Indie Groundbreaker Awards nominees [are out!](https://www.igdnonline.com/groundbreakers)
Extremely honored to see my game [The Great Soul Train Robbery](https://cloven-pine-games.itch.io/the-great-soul-train-robbery) nominated for Best Rules.
Congrats to all my fellow nominees, including Gauntleteers Jamila Nedjadi for [Balikbayan](https://temporalhiccup.itch.io/balikbayan) and Oli Jeffrey for [Quietus](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/297814)!
